title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Enhancement: Online Science Information Literacy Expansion Program: Project-Based

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific research methodologies and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can select credible online information sources (academic databases, government reports, etc.) according to scientific research questions with 80% accuracy.
Learners can validate scientific data relevant to project topics using a three-stage evaluation framework (source credibility, data recency, methodological validity).
Learners can reconstruct scientific information into visualizations (infographics, dashboards) for sharing with team members.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
